A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have read so much negativity about The Last Jedi on the internet and am at a loss to understand what those fans were looking for. Johnson's writing and direction were bold and took Star Wars into new and exciting territory. It felt to me that he successfully managed the fine balance between respecting and referencing the previous saga while pushing forward into a much needed new era. There was also balance between humour\, emotional drama\, exhilarating speed\, all those important cinematic elements. John Williams' score brought me to tears as always\, as of course did Carrie's final performance.
